auth.resetMsg: Alternatively, clear your credentials and stored data to set a new password
auth.initMsg: Create a password to encrypt your API credentials & strategies. All data is stored locally, and your password is hashed

joyride.trading1: Customized layouts can be saved here
joyride.trading2: You can find your notifications here
joyride.trading3: If you want to create an order, this menu contains all orders available
joyride.trading4: Here you can find the current version of your app. In case there is an update, there will be an update button
joyride.market: To customize your layout, you can add components to it
joyride.strategyEditor3: In this section you find the available function declarations to code your own strategies
